00018 #ifndef COBASE_PERTHREADREF_H
00019 #define COBASE_PERTHREADREF_H
00020 
00021 #include <co/base/os.h>
00022 #include <co/base/debug.h>
00023 #include <co/base/refPtr.h>
00024 
00025 namespace co
00026 {
00027 namespace base
00028 {
00029     class PerThreadRefPrivate;
00030 
00039     template< typename T > class PerThreadRef : public NonCopyable
00040     {
00041     public:
00043         PerThreadRef();
00045         ~PerThreadRef();
00046 
00048         PerThreadRef<T>& operator = ( RefPtr< T > data );
00049 
00051         PerThreadRef<T>& operator = ( const PerThreadRef<T>& rhs );
00052 
00054         RefPtr< const T > get() const;
00056         RefPtr< T > get();
00057 
00062         T* getPointer();
00063 
00068         T* operator->();
00069 
00074         const T* operator->() const;
00075 
00080         bool operator == ( const PerThreadRef& rhs ) const 
00081             { return ( get() == rhs.get( )); }
00082 
00087         bool operator == ( const RefPtr< T >& rhs ) const
00088             { return ( get()==rhs ); }
00089 
00094         bool operator != ( const RefPtr< T >& rhs ) const
00095             { return ( get()!=rhs ); }
00096 
00101         bool operator ! () const;
00102 
00107         bool isValid() const;
00108 
00109     private:
00110         PerThreadRefPrivate* _data;
00111     };
00112 
00113 
00114 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00115 // implementation
00116 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00117 
00118 // Crude test if pthread.h was included
00119 #ifdef PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER
00120 #  ifndef HAVE_PTHREAD_H
00121 #    define HAVE_PTHREAD_H
00122 #  endif
00123 #endif
00124 
00125 #ifdef HAVE_PTHREAD_H
00126 
00127 class PerThreadRefPrivate
00128 {
00129 public:
00130     pthread_key_t key;
00131 };
00132 
00133 template< typename T >
00134 PerThreadRef<T>::PerThreadRef() 
00135         : _data( new PerThreadRefPrivate )
00136 {
00137     const int error = pthread_key_create( &_data->key, 0 );
00138     if( error )
00139     {
00140         EQERROR << "Can't create thread-specific key: " 
00141                 << strerror( error ) << std::endl;
00142         EQASSERT( !error );
00143     }
00144 }
00145 
00146 template< typename T >
00147 PerThreadRef<T>::~PerThreadRef()
00148 {
00149     RefPtr< T > object = get();
00150 
00151     pthread_key_delete( _data->key );
00152     delete _data;
00153     _data = 0;
00154 
00155     object.unref();
00156 }
00157 
00158 template< typename T >
00159 PerThreadRef<T>& PerThreadRef<T>::operator = ( RefPtr< T > data )
00160 { 
00161     data.ref(); // ref new
00162 
00163     RefPtr< T > object = get();
00164     pthread_setspecific( _data->key, static_cast<const void*>( data.get( )));
00165 
00166     object.unref(); // unref old
00167     return *this; 
00168 }
00169 
00170 template< typename T >
00171 PerThreadRef<T>& PerThreadRef<T>::operator = ( const PerThreadRef<T>& rhs )
00172 {
00173     RefPtr< T > newObject = rhs.get();
00174     newObject.ref(); // ref new
00175 
00176     RefPtr< T > object = get();
00177     pthread_setspecific( _data->key, pthread_getspecific( rhs._data->key ));
00178 
00179     object.unref(); // unref old
00180     return *this;
00181 }
00182 
00183 template< typename T >
00184 RefPtr< const T > PerThreadRef<T>::get() const
00185 {
00186     return static_cast< const T* >( pthread_getspecific( _data->key )); 
00187 }
00188 
00189 template< typename T >
00190 RefPtr< T > PerThreadRef<T>::get()
00191 {
00192     return static_cast< T* >( pthread_getspecific( _data->key )); 
00193 }
00194 
00195 template< typename T >
00196 T* PerThreadRef<T>::getPointer()
00197 {
00198     return static_cast< T* >( pthread_getspecific( _data->key )); 
00199 }
00200 
00201 template< typename T >
00202 T* PerThreadRef<T>::operator->() 
00203 {
00204     EQASSERT( pthread_getspecific( _data->key ));
00205     return static_cast< T* >( pthread_getspecific( _data->key )); 
00206 }
00207 
00208 template< typename T >
00209 const T* PerThreadRef<T>::operator->() const 
00210 { 
00211     EQASSERT( pthread_getspecific( _data->key ));
00212     return static_cast< const T* >( pthread_getspecific( _data->key )); 
00213 }
00214 
00215 template< typename T >
00216 bool PerThreadRef<T>::operator ! () const
00217 {
00218     return pthread_getspecific( _data->key ) == 0;
00219 }
00220 
00221 template< typename T >
00222 bool PerThreadRef<T>::isValid() const
00223 {
00224     return pthread_getspecific( _data->key ) != 0;
00225 }

00227 #endif // HAVE_PTHREAD_H
